text: Kim Kardashian and husband Kanye West aren't adding to their family anytime soon. On Tuesday, the 37 - year - old reality star shut down baby number four rumors while talking with E! News.'None of that was true,'she told the website of baby rumors.'I've been really open about it and talked about it on our show. We start filming season 16 next week, so if I think about it more and it's gon na happen, you'll definitely see it on the show,'Kim shared.'But as of now, no.'Holding off : On Tuesday, Kim Kardashian shut down baby number four rumors while talking to E!
